1370: Hako moved to Papenhofstede.B.0 after marriage.
Got married to Ryccie at age 36 in 1370.
1371: Had a son with Ryccie, Hako, at age 37.
1372: Had a son with Ryccie, Clemmam, at age 38.
1374: Had a daughter with Ryccie, Siburgis, at age 40.
1376: Had a son with Ryccie, Wlfarde, at age 42.
1378: Had a daughter with Ryccie, Sophia, at age 44.
Became caretaker of Hako, Clemmam, Siburgis, Wlfarde, Sophia at age 45.
1379: Lost daughter Siburgis when Siburgis was 6 years old.
